result.formatted_address: 2-3號舖, HK 香港島 Metropole Building, 416號 King's Rd, North Point, Hong Kong
result.name: Saizeriya

reviews.text:
Oh yeah! I love it here... The food, I'm a pasta lover, the idea of unlimited drink and of course the place itself is very welcoming... We come out of the resto satisfied and full. And the price is affordable. Very much recommended! 
Friendly atmosphere....

Definitely value for money, worth the waiting. Steak is the best dish, dessert tastes wonderful. The only draw back is the disgusting coffee cups. At least 70% of the "clean" cups are stained with lip stick or marks of coffee or chocolate. Be advised to rinse with boiling water before using, but watch out for hot water burns. 
Otherwise, I would have rated 4 stars.
Dirty. But the food is tasty and not expensive.
Cheap tea n taste ok
Very cheap, got my pizza fix, and the place is very efficient, but not food and service not incredible

result.name: Saizeriya

reviews.text: 價格親民的意菜👍
好味🤤
小朋友好喜歡😍😍😍

Oh yeah! I love it here... The food, I'm a pasta lover, the idea of unlimited drink and of course the place itself is very welcoming... We come out of the resto satisfied and full. And the price is affordable. Very much recommended! 
Friendly atmosphere....

上星期六下午五後到柴灣環翠商場店，先点二小食，另一朋友在五点九到後点主食，但約七点時有一職員面黑黑態度麻麻走過嚟話限時二個鐘快到，仲想叫嘢食就快啲一齊叫埋，最後我地再叫甜品。
若餐廳有二小時限時的話，應該通知或張貼在明顯位置，讓所有食客得知，而並非針對個別食客。
滿面瘡瘡嘅男職員態度極差，餐廳應該陪訓一下，以免影響餐廳形象。
